casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey Robert PARISI 65A17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 22, 2018 John W. Congleton, Assistant Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Michele A. Goldman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Parisi, Jeffrey Robert.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 19th of October 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of October 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 5th day of November 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
